details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.1 General - Artifact or real content
details.description: Content shall be marked in the structure tree with semantically appropriate tags in a logical reading order. Content that does not render and does not have a rendered equivalent shall be marked as an artifact.

rule.description: Content shall be marked in the structure tree with semantically appropriate tags in a logical reading order. Content that does not render and does not have a rendered equivalent shall be marked as an artifact.

error.message: Content is neither marked as Artifact nor tagged as real content
